original: Saraṇaṁ dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nadassanena pahātabbahetuko🔽dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… sahajāte tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: saraṇam dassanena pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na dassanena pahātabba hetukaḥ  dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekaḥ ārammaṇe ekam pe sahajāte tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Saraṇaṁ bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko🔽dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… sahajāte tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: saraṇam bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukaḥ  dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekaḥ ārammaṇe ekam pe sahajāte tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Araṇaṁ nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naaraṇo nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: araṇam na iva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca na araṇaḥ na neva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka
